patthana20.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:2.1_1: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:2.1_2: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:3.1_0: Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:3.1_1: Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:3.1_2: Nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:4.1_0: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:4.1_1: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:4.1_2: Nahetuñca nanahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:7.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:7.1_1: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:7.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:8.1_0: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:8.1_1: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:8.1_2: Naahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:9.1_0: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:9.1_1: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:9.1_2: Nasahetukañca naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.1:10.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:11.1_0: Nahetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:12.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.1:13.1_0: Nahetuñceva naahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:15.1_0: Nahetuñceva nahetuvippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.1:17.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.1:18.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
